select A.id, A.bei_zhu_xin_xi, A.danq_qian_nian_ji, A.gen_jin_ren_id, A.jia_ting_zhu_zhi, A.jiu_du_xue_xiao, A.nan_ling, A.tou_xiang, A.xing_bie, A.xing_ming, A.xue_yuan_lai_yuan, A.zhang_hao_id, A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai, B.shou_ji as zhangHaoShouJi, C.xing_ming as genJinRenXingMing from xue_yuan A join zhang_hao B on A.zhang_hao_id = B.id left join zhang_hao C on A.gen_jin_ren_id = C.id
A.id = #{xueYuanId} and A.is_deleted = 0 and B.zhang_hao_lei_xing = 'XUE_YUAN'

select B.id, B.ming_cheng from xue_yuan_biao_qian_zu A join biao_qian B on A.biao_qian_id = B.id
A.xue_yuan_id = #{xueYuanId} and B.is_deleted = 0

select A.id, A.bei_zhu_xin_xi, A.danq_qian_nian_ji, A.gen_jin_ren_id, A.jia_ting_zhu_zhi, A.jiu_du_xue_xiao, A.nan_ling, A.tou_xiang, A.xing_bie, A.xing_ming, A.xue_yuan_lai_yuan, A.zhang_hao_id, A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai, B.shou_ji as zhangHaoShouJi, C.xing_ming as genJinRenXingMing from xue_yuan A join zhang_hao B on A.zhang_hao_id = B.id left join zhang_hao C on A.gen_jin_ren_id = C.id
A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai = 'ZAI_DU' and B.zhang_hao_lei_xing = 'XUE_YUAN' order by A.create_time desc

select A.id, A.bei_zhu_xin_xi, A.danq_qian_nian_ji, A.gen_jin_ren_id, A.jia_ting_zhu_zhi, A.jiu_du_xue_xiao, A.nan_ling, A.tou_xiang, A.xing_bie, A.xing_ming, A.xue_yuan_lai_yuan, A.zhang_hao_id, A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai, B.shou_ji as zhangHaoShouJi, C.xing_ming as genJinRenXingMing from xue_yuan A join zhang_hao B on A.zhang_hao_id = B.id left join zhang_hao C on A.gen_jin_ren_id = C.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xing_ming = #{xingMing} and B.shou_ji = #{shouJi} and B.zhang_hao_lei_xing = 'XUE_YUAN'

select A.id, A.bei_zhu_xin_xi, A.danq_qian_nian_ji, A.gen_jin_ren_id, A.jia_ting_zhu_zhi, A.jiu_du_xue_xiao, A.nan_ling, A.tou_xiang, A.xing_bie, A.xing_ming, A.xue_yuan_lai_yuan, A.zhang_hao_id, A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai, B.shou_ji as zhangHaoShouJi, C.xing_ming as genJinRenXingMing from xue_yuan A left join zhang_hao B on A.zhang_hao_id = B.id left join zhang_hao C on A.gen_jin_ren_id = C.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai = 'ZAI_DU'
order by A.update_time desc

select sum(A.ke_cheng_shu_liang) as gouMaiKeShi from xue_yuan_ke_cheng A
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_id = #{xue_yuan_id}

select sum(A.zeng_song_ke_shi) as zenSongKeShi from xue_yuan_ke_cheng A
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_id = #{xue_yuan_id}

select sum(A.sheng_yu_ke_shi) as shengYuKeShi from xue_yuan_ke_cheng A
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_id = #{xue_yuan_id}

select A.id, A.bei_zhu_xin_xi, A.danq_qian_nian_ji, A.gen_jin_ren_id, A.jia_ting_zhu_zhi, A.jiu_du_xue_xiao, A.nan_ling, A.tou_xiang, A.xing_bie, A.xing_ming, A.xue_yuan_lai_yuan, A.zhang_hao_id, A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai, B.shou_ji as zhangHaoShouJi, C.xing_ming as genJinRenXingMing, SUM(D.ke_cheng_shu_liang) as gouMaiKeShi, SUM(D.zeng_song_ke_shi) as zengSongKeShi,SUM(D.sheng_yu_ke_shi) as shengYuKeShi, SUM(D.xiao_ke_jine) as xiaoKeJinE from xue_yuan A left join zhang_hao B on A.zhang_hao_id = B.id left join zhang_hao C on A.gen_jin_ren_id = C.id left join xue_yuan_ke_cheng D on D.xue_yuan_id = A.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and A.xue_yuan_zhuang_tai = 'ZAI_DU' group by A.id
order by A.update_time desc
